value:
Regardless of my light attire, I am
still always ready to fight, should the
need arise.

Much of the Kingdom of Faerghus is
just barren land... Compared to that,
this island is like a paradise.

I hear Edelgard is training on the
beach instead of swimming. Well, I'm
sure she knows what she's doing.

How strange. Merely listening to the
sound of the waves seems to put my
heart at ease...

My home gets a lot of snow, so I am
used to the cold. But all this sunshine
will take some time to adjust to...

I am Dimitri, from the Holy Kingdom
of Faerghus. I have an invitation for
you from $Nf.$k$pWell? Would you care to join us in
our tropical-island training?

Looks like the training has paid off.
It was well worth working up a sweat.

No matter how tall the waves, I will
not be swept away.

This heat is...exhausting. Please give
me...just a moment...

I trust your judgment. If you say that I
need this, I will believe you.

I am Dimitri, of the Blue Lion House.
Even if it is only as practice, I will give
my all to swimming around the island.

Oh, are you already done swimming?
I haven't run into any problems, so I'll
keep going for a while longer.$k$pHm, yes... I suppose you have a point.
Claude also said something about rest
being an important part of training.$k$pVery well, I will follow your example
and do my best to relax.$k$pYou know, this island is quite lovely.
It has plenty of fruit and seafood,
and, of course, a pleasant breeze.$k$pIf there really is such a thing as
paradise, I think it would probably
be a place like this.$k$pTomorrow, we will no doubt be back
on the battlefield. But until then, I will
remember the time I've spent here.$k$pThat will be what gives me the
strength to move forward—to
accomplish what I must.
たあっ！
ふっ！
ううっ…！
I'm drowning..!
You're going under!
Even in the water!
You cannot win.
Tired already?
I just need a little rest...
Okay...
Thank you for inviting me to this island. Perhaps it's OK to have some fun today.
What? Oh, a drink? It is rather hot.
This place is so warm and bright compared to the Kingdom of Faerghus.
I don't do well with the heat... Hey, no laughing. We all have our weaknesses.
I'd rather be in the water than on the hot beach. I'm going to swim over to that island.
It's not often I can forget about fighting and spend a day relaxing.
I don't know how best to say this, but... I was honored to join you at the beach today.
All right.
In this heat?
I'll go ahead.
